00038 #include "egs_stack_geometry.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 string EGS_StackGeometry::type = "EGS_StackGeometry";
00043 
00044 EGS_StackGeometry::EGS_StackGeometry(const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms,
00045                                      EGS_Float Tol, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), eps(Tol) {
00046     if (geoms.size() < 2) egsFatal("EGS_StackGeometry::EGS_StackGeometry: "
00047                                        " less than 2 geometries is not mermitted\n");
00048     ng = geoms.size();
00049     g = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [ng];
00050     nmax = 1;
00051     has_rho_scaling = false;
00052     for (int j=0; j<ng; j++) {
00053         g[j] = geoms[j];
00054         g[j]->ref();
00055         int n = g[j]->regions();
00056         if (n > nmax) {
00057             nmax = n;
00058         }
00059         if (!has_rho_scaling) {
00060             has_rho_scaling = g[j]->hasRhoScaling();
00061         }
00062     }
00063     nreg = ng*nmax;
00064     is_convex = false;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 EGS_StackGeometry::~EGS_StackGeometry() {
00069     for (int j=0; j<ng; j++)
00070         if (!g[j]->deref()) {
00071             delete g[j];
00072         }
00073     delete [] g;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void EGS_StackGeometry::printInfo() const {
00077     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00078     egsInformation(" geometries:\n");
00079     for (int j=0; j<ng; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00080                                                 g[j]->getName().c_str(),g[j]->getType().c_str());
00081     egsInformation(
00082         "=======================================================\n");
00083 }

00087                " setMedia() methods of the geometry objects that make up this geometry\n");
00088 }

00100 extern "C" {
00101 
00102     EGS_STACKG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00103         if (!input) {
00104             egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): null input?\n");
00105             return 0;
00106         }
00107         vector<string> gnames;
00108         vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> geoms;
00109         int err = input->getInput("geometries",gnames);
00110         if (err || gnames.size() < 2) {
00111             egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): missing/wrong 'geometries' input\n");
00112             return 0;
00113         }
00114         for (unsigned int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) {
00115             EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gnames[j]);
00116             if (!gj) egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): no geometry named %s "
00117                                     " defined\n",gnames[j].c_str());
00118             else {
00119                 geoms.push_back(gj);
00120             }
00121         }
00122         if (geoms.size() < 2) {
00123             egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): must have at least 2 geometries\n");
00124             return 0;
00125         }
00126         EGS_Float tol = 1e-4;
00127         err = input->getInput("tolerance",tol);
00128         EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_StackGeometry(geoms,tol);
00129         result->setName(input);
00130         result->setLabels(input);
00131         return result;
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     void EGS_StackGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00136 
00137         vector<int> local_regs;
00138 
00139         // label defined in the stacked geometries
00140         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++) {
00141             local_regs.clear();
00142             g[i]->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
00143             for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
00144                 regs.push_back(i*nmax + local_regs[j]);
00145             }
00146         }
00147 
00148         // label defined in self (stack input block)
00149         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00150 
00151     }
00152 
00153 
00154 }
